subfields.a: A collection of short stories featuring African American preteen boys as central characters. These diverse characters are funny, serious, edgy, and studious.

subfields.a: 12 great tips on writing a blog /
Twelve great tips on writing a blog

Have a purpose -- Know your audience -- Plan your posts -- Identify keywords -- Give away your knowledge -- Write catchy headlines -- Use white space -- Pictures say 1,000 words -- Include links -- Keep it short -- Review and edit -- Engage your audience -- Writer's checklist.
Shares tips for creating and maintaining a blog. Includes a checklist, a glossary, resources for further information, and color photographs.

subfields.a: Contains a choose-your-own-path story describing the life and times of ancient China. The reader's choices reveal the historical details of life from the perspectives of several characters. Includes forty-three choices and twenty-four endings.

When a twelve-year-old evil genius tries to restore his family fortune by capturing a fairy and demanding a ransom in gold, the fairies fight back with magic, technology, and a particularly nasty troll.
